name: Non Zero Deaths
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!!

A and D to move Space bar to Jump,

R to restart Level

When you die, you spawn a death box which you can use to reach unreachable places.

Use the ability to your advantage as there is a green bomb in the game when triggered your deathbox becomes explosive. Normal bombs spawn normal deathboxes.

A game made for Wowie Jam 3.0, Theme of the jam is Failure is progress.

Credits: Art and code by me

music by http://www.anthonysabatinomusic.com/
